meanings.definition: Resembling hazel in color or texture.
meanings.sent1: The hazelly leaves rustled in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent2: Her hazelly hair shone in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The hazelly squirrel scurried up the tree with a nut in its mouth.
meanings.sent4: The hazelly sky at dawn painted the horizon with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The hazelly fur of the rabbit blended perfectly with the forest floor.

meanings.sent1: The hazelly wood was smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent2: She had a hazelly voice that was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent3: The hazelly personality of the cat made it a favorite among the family.
meanings.sent4: His hazelly eyes reflected kindness and understanding.
meanings.sent5: The hazelly scent of the candle filled the room with comfort.

meanings.sent1: The hazelly coat of the dog glistened in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The hazelly paint on the walls gave the room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent3: The hazelly cookies were a hit at the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: Her hazelly dress matched perfectly with her shoes.
meanings.sent5: The hazelly sand on the beach sparkled under the afternoon sun.
